lines.text: You can stop me, but you're never gonna stop rock & roll!
My life was nothing until I found the music.
Hey, look. If they took it all away tomorrow, we'd be even. No we wouldn't. We'd be way ahead.
This is Alan Freed... and this is Rock and Roll.
You know, rock and roll has been pretty good to me. I think I'll dedicate this one to it.
